summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4124 for the improvement of alley Block 9, Graham's University Addition, being the alley between 6th Avenue Northeast and 7th Avenue Northeast, from East 50th Street to East 53rd Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 49434, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
